title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Skills: Negotiated Hierarchy Model-Based Constructivist Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze social issues in a constructivist learning environment through VR simulations.
Learners can collaborate with peers to revise and improve learning objectives using a negotiation hierarchy model.
Learners can develop educational scenarios applying constructivist learning design principles through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
